segments.text: I can't believe what's happening in this kitchen drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, but the sink behind her is flooding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling everywhere, ruining the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not even glancing at the mess under her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden outside, so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the boy is risking his neck on that tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling cookies from the jar high up in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching out, probably begging for one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They think they're being sneaky, but it's so obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If the stool tips, he'll fall right onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And with all that water, slipping is inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should be watching them instead of the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR
